Package com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Barrier
    Simple thread barrier interface.
    BarrierFactory
    Factory for creating Barrier instances.
    CircularBuffer<E>
    Interface to be implemented by concurrent circular buffer implementations.
    CircularBufferConsumer<E>
    Interface to be implement by CircularBuffer consumers.
    CircularBufferMXBean
    JMX management API for CircularBuffer implementations.
    CircularBufferProcessor<T>
    Interface to be used by CircularBufferActor event processors.
    CircularBufferProducer<S,T>
    Interface for inserting elements into a CircularBuffer.
    ElementFactory<E>
    Factory for creating CircularBuffer elements.
    Movable<S,T,R>
    Interface indicating an object is movable to the specified target type.
    SingleConsumerCircularBufferQueue.Consumer<U>
    An instance of this interface is used to consume elements off the queue.
    SingleConsumerSelfMovableCircularBufferQueue.SelfMovable<U>
    Instances of this interface are used in conjunction with a Movable to transfer state between two objects of the same type by performing a simple copy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarrierBase
    Base class for all barrier implementations.
    BlockingBarrier
    Blocking/notifying Barrier implementation based on an object monitor.
    CircularBuffer.Entry<E>
    Single buffer entry.
    CircularBufferActor<S,T,R>
    Simple actor implementation which uses a CircularBuffer to pass events from many producers to a single consumer.
    CircularBufferJMXUtils
    JMX utilities for CircularBuffer management.
    LockFreeCircularBufferProducer<S,T>
    A lock free CircularBufferProducer.
    LockingCircularBufferProducer<S,T>
    A locking CircularBufferProducer implementation.
    ModuloTwoUtils
    Simple modulo 2 utilities.
    SingleConsumerCircularBuffer<E>
    Implementation of CircularBuffer suitable when there is only a single consumer thread.
    SingleConsumerCircularBufferQueue<T>
    Simple utility queue implementation that wraps a CircularBuffer and supports multiple producers and one consumer.
    SingleConsumerSelfMovableCircularBufferQueue<T extends SingleConsumerSelfMovableCircularBufferQueue.SelfMovable<T>>
    Specialization of SingleConsumerCircularBufferQueue that expects elements stored in the buffer to be instances of interface SingleConsumerSelfMovableCircularBufferQueue.SelfMovable.
    SpinAndYieldBarrier
    Spin and yield Barrier implementation.
    SpinBarrier
    Base implementation of a spinning (i.e.
    SpinYieldAndParkBarrier
    Slightly less resource intensive version of the SpinAndYieldBarrier.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WaitScheme
    Circular buffer barrier wait schemes.
